alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Eastern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:17AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Will, Central Cook and Southern Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow is possible across eastern Cook and eastern Will Counties late this morning. If this lake effect snow develops, an additional 1 to 3 inches of snow is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; Eastern Will; Southern Cook
